Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to dispensing certain individuals with opioid reversal drugs upon discharge
Summary: Requires inpatient facilities to dispense at-risk individuals with opioid reversal drugs upon discharge.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-u, Pub Health L; amd ยง29.15, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to dispensing certain individuals with opioid reversal drugs upon discharge
